sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT C.TABLE_SCHEMA AS TableSchema, C.TABLE_NAME AS TableName,
    C.COLUMN_NAME AS ColumnName, C.ORDINAL_POSITION AS OrdinalPosition,
    C.DATA_TYPE AS DataType, C.IS_NULLABLE AS IsNullable,
    ISNULL(C.DATETIME_PRECISION,C.NUMERIC_PRECISION) AS DateNumPrecision,
    C.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH AS CharacterMaxLength,
    NULL AS Abbreviation
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS C 
ORDER BY C.TABLE_SCHEMA, C.TABLE_NAME, C.ORDINAL_POSITION

text.value:
INSERT INTO stage1.marvel_json_raw
SELECT BulkColumn
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'Data/marvel_search/@{item().name}',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'ADV_EDS',
    SINGLE_CLOB
) AS J

properties.description: Connect to GitHub to extract sample files and data

content.query:
IF EXISTS (select * from sys.external_data_sources where name = 'ADV_DATA_EDS')
	DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ADV_DATA_EDS]
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ADV_DATA_EDS] WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'abfss://synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/Data/',
	TYPE = HADOOP
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [ADV_JSON_DATA_EFF] 
WITH (
	FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT, 
	FORMAT_OPTIONS (
		FIELD_TERMINATOR = '0x0b', 
		USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = False
	)
)
GO

CREATE SCHEMA source
GO
CREATE SCHEMA stage1
GO
CREATE SCHEMA stage2
GO
CREATE SCHEMA vault
GO
CREATE SCHEMA mart
GO

IF EXISTS (select * from sys.external_data_sources where name = 'ADV_DATA_EDS')
	DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ADV_DATA_EDS]
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ADV_DATA_EDS] WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'abfss://synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/Data/',
	TYPE = HADOOP
)

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = '2N0&b#PNOAN'
GO
ALTER MASTER KEY ADD ENCRYPTION BY SERVICE MASTER KEY
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL MSI_CRED
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Service Identity';

IF EXISTS (select * from sys.external_data_sources where name = 'EDS_SynapseDvDemo')
	DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [EDS_SynapseDvDemo]
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [EDS_SynapseDvDemo] WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'abfss://synapsedvdemo@synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net',
	CREDENTIAL = [MSI_CRED]
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [EFF_Parquet] WITH 
(
	FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET
)

IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE NAME = 'EFF_CSV_NoHeader')
    DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [EFF_CSV_NoHeader]
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT EFF_CSV_NoHeader
WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS(
          FIELD_TERMINATOR = '|',
          STRING_DELIMITER = '`',
          USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = False)
)

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.marvel_hero_raw

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [EDS_SYNAPSEDVDEMO] 
WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'https://synapsedvdemo.blob.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/'
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [EFF_CSV_JSON] WITH
(
	FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS ( FIELD_TERMINATOR = '|', STRING_DELIMITER = '`'   )
)

DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [ADV_JSON_DATA_EFF]
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [ADV_JSON_DATA_EFF] 
WITH (
	FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT, 
	FORMAT_OPTIONS (
		FIELD_TERMINATOR = N'0x0b', 
		USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = False
	)
)
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.STG_marvel_hero_raw') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE stage1.STG_marvel_hero_raw
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE stage1.STG_marvel_hero_raw
(
    doc NVARCHAR(MAX)
)
WITH (
    DATA_SOURCE = [EDS_SynapseDvDemo],
    FILE_FORMAT = [EFF_Parquet],
    LOCATION = '/Stage1/marvel_hero/'
)

/* 
SELECT *
FROM stage1.STG_marvel_hero_raw 
*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[vault].[HUB_BEING]') IS NOT NULL
	DROP TABLE [vault].[HUB_BEING]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [vault].[HUB_BEING]
( 
	[HUB_BEING_BKEY] [varchar](4000)  NOT NULL,
	[URL] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[SOURCE_URL] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[RSRC] [varchar](4000)  NULL,
	[LDDTS] [datetime2](7)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [HUB_BEING_BKEY] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

;WITH ZeroGhostRecords AS (
	SELECT *
	FROM (
		SELECT '0|0','0','0','SYS_GhostRec','1/1/1900' UNION ALL
		SELECT '-1|-1','-1','-1','SYS_NullKey_Required','1/1/1900' UNION ALL
		SELECT '-2|-2','-2','-2','SYS_NullKey_Optional','1/1/1900'
	) tbl(HUB_BEING_BKEY, URL, SOURCE_URL, RSRC, LDDTS)
)

INSERT INTO vault.HUB_BEING (HUB_BEING_BKEY, URL, SOURCE_URL, RSRC, LDDTS)
SELECT HUB_BEING_BKEY, URL, SOURCE_URL, RSRC, LDDTS
FROM ZeroGhostRecords zgr 
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
	SELECT 1
	FROM vault.HUB_BEING vhb
	WHERE zgr.HUB_BEING_BKEY = vhb.HUB_BEING_BKEY
)

GO

SELECT *
FROM vault.HUB_BEING

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'STG_kaggle_superhero' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'stage1')
	DROP TABLE stage1.STG_kaggle_superhero
GO

CREATE TABLE stage1.STG_kaggle_superhero
	(
	 [name] varchar(4000),
	 [real_name] varchar(4000),
	 [full_name] varchar(4000),
	 [overall_score] varchar(4000),
	 [history_text] varchar(max),
	 [powers_text] varchar(max),
	 [intelligence_score] int,
	 [strength_score] int,
	 [speed_score] int,
	 [durability_score] int,
	 [power_score] int,
	 [combat_score] int,
	 [superpowers] nvarchar(max),
	 [alter_egos] nvarchar(max),
	 [aliases] nvarchar(max),
	 [place_of_birth] varchar(4000),
	 [first_appearance] varchar(4000),
	 [creator] varchar(4000),
	 [alignment] varchar(4000),
	 [occupation] varchar(4000),
	 [base] varchar(4000),
	 [teams] nvarchar(max),
	 [relatives] nvarchar(max),
	 [gender] varchar(4000),
	 [type_race] varchar(4000),
	 [height] varchar(4000),
	 [weight] varchar(4000),
	 [eye_color] varchar(4000),
	 [hair_color] varchar(4000),
	 [skin_color] varchar(4000),
	 [img] varchar(4000),
	 [has_electrokinesis] float,
	 [has_energy_constructs] float,
	 [has_mind_control_resistance] float,
	 [has_matter_manipulation] float,
	 [has_telepathy_resistance] float,
	 [has_mind_control] float,
	 [has_enhanced_hearing] float,
	 [has_dimensional_travel] float,
	 [has_element_control] float,
	 [has_size_changing] float,
	 [has_fire_resistance] float,
	 [has_fire_control] float,
	 [has_dexterity] float,
	 [has_reality_warping] float,
	 [has_illusions] float,
	 [has_energy_beams] float,
	 [has_peak_human_condition] float,
	 [has_shapeshifting] float,
	 [has_heat_resistance] float,
	 [has_jump] float,
	 [has_self-sustenance] float,
	 [has_energy_absorption] float,
	 [has_cold_resistance] float,
	 [has_magic] float,
	 [has_telekinesis] float,
	 [has_toxin_and_disease_resistance] float,
	 [has_telepathy] float,
	 [has_regeneration] float,
	 [has_immortality] float,
	 [has_teleportation] float,
	 [has_force_fields] float,
	 [has_energy_manipulation] float,
	 [has_endurance] float,
	 [has_longevity] float,
	 [has_weapon-based_powers] float,
	 [has_energy_blasts] float,
	 [has_enhanced_senses] float,
	 [has_invulnerability] float,
	 [has_stealth] float,
	 [has_marksmanship] float,
	 [has_flight] float,
	 [has_accelerated_healing] float,
	 [has_weapons_master] float,
	 [has_intelligence] float,
	 [has_reflexes] float,
	 [has_super_speed] float,
	 [has_durability] float,
	 [has_stamina] float,
	 [has_agility] float,
	 [has_super_strength] float
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestration
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_kaggle_superhero
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO stage1.STG_kaggle_superhero
(name 1, real_name 2, full_name 3, overall_score 4, history_text 5, powers_text 6, intelligence_score 7, strength_score 8, 
speed_score 9, durability_score 10, power_score 11, combat_score 12, superpowers 13, alter_egos 14, aliases 15, place_of_birth 16, 
first_appearance 17, creator 18, alignment 19, occupation 20, base 21, teams 22, relatives 23, gender 24, type_race 25, height 26, 
weight 27, eye_color 28, hair_color 29, skin_color 30, img 31, has_electrokinesis 32, has_energy_constructs 33, has_mind_control_resistance 34, 
has_matter_manipulation 35, has_telepathy_resistance 36, has_mind_control 37, has_enhanced_hearing 38, has_dimensional_travel 39, 
has_element_control 40, has_size_changing 41, has_fire_resistance 42, has_fire_control 43, has_dexterity 44, has_reality_warping 45, 
has_illusions 46, has_energy_beams 47, has_peak_human_condition 48, has_shapeshifting 49, has_heat_resistance 50, has_jump 51, 
[has_self-sustenance] 52, has_energy_absorption 53, has_cold_resistance 54, has_magic 55, has_telekinesis 56, has_toxin_and_disease_resistance 57, 
has_telepathy 58, has_regeneration 59, has_immortality 60, has_teleportation 61, has_force_fields 62, has_energy_manipulation 63, has_endurance 64, 
has_longevity 65, [has_weapon-based_powers] 66, has_energy_blasts 67, has_enhanced_senses 68, has_invulnerability 69, has_stealth 70, 
has_marksmanship 71, has_flight 72, has_accelerated_healing 73, has_weapons_master 74, has_intelligence 75, has_reflexes 76, has_super_speed 77, 
has_durability 78, has_stamina 79, has_agility 80, has_super_strength 81)
FROM 'https://synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/Data/kaggle_superhero/superheroes_nlp_dataset.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/'
	,CREDENTIAL = ( IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity' )
	,ERRORFILE_CREDENTIAL = ( IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity' )
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM stage1.STG_kaggle_superhero
GO
IF OBJECT_ID(')

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.STG_superhero_raw') IS NOT NULL
    DROP TABLE stage1.STG_superhero_raw
GO

CREATE TABLE stage1.STG_superhero_raw (
    [NAME] VARCHAR(1000),
    [URL] VARCHAR(4000),
    [INTELLIGENCE] VARCHAR(100),
    [STRENGTH] VARCHAR(100),
    [SPEED] VARCHAR(100),
    [DURABILITY] VARCHAR(100),
    [POWER] VARCHAR(100),
    [COMBAT] VARCHAR(100),
    [FULL_NAME] VARCHAR(100),
    [ALTER_EGOS] NVARCHAR(MAX),
    [ALIASES] NVARCHAR(MAX),
    [PLACE_OF_BIRTH] VARCHAR(100),
    [FIRST_APPEARANCE] VARCHAR(4000),
    [CREATOR] VARCHAR(100),
    [ALIGNMENT] VARCHAR(100),
    [GENDER] VARCHAR(20),
    [RACE] VARCHAR(20),
    [HEIGHT] VARCHAR(20),
    [WEIGHT] VARCHAR(20),
    [EYE_COLOR] VARCHAR(10),
    [HAIR_COLOR] VARCHAR(10),
    [OCCUPATION] VARCHAR(100),
    [BASE] VARCHAR(100),
    [TEAM_AFFILIATION] VARCHAR(4000),
    [RELATIVES] VARCHAR(4000),
    [SKIN_COLOR] VARCHAR(10),
    [TOTAL_POWER] VARCHAR(100)
)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 HEAP
	)
GO


COPY INTO stage1.STG_superhero_raw
    ([NAME] 1, [URL] 2, [INTELLIGENCE] 3, [STRENGTH] 4, [SPEED] 5, [DURABILITY] 6, 
    [POWER] 7, [COMBAT] 8, [FULL_NAME] 9, [ALTER_EGOS] 10, [ALIASES] 11, [PLACE_OF_BIRTH] 12, 
    [FIRST_APPEARANCE] 13, [CREATOR] 14, [ALIGNMENT] 15, [GENDER] 16, [RACE] 17, [HEIGHT] 18, 
    [WEIGHT] 19, [EYE_COLOR] 20, [HAIR_COLOR] 21, [OCCUPATION] 22, [BASE] 23, [TEAM_AFFILIATION] 24, 
    [RELATIVES] 25, [SKIN_COLOR] 26, [TOTAL_POWER] 27)
FROM 'https://synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/Data/superherodb/SUPERHERO_RAW.csv'
WITH
    (
        FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
        ,MAXERRORS = 1000
        ,FIRSTROW = 2
        ,ERRORFILE = 'https://synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/'
        ,CREDENTIAL = ( IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity' )
        ,ERRORFILE_CREDENTIAL = ( IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity' )
    )

GO

SELECT *
FROM stage1.STG_superhero_raw

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_STG_kaggle_superhero_base') IS NOT NULL 
    DROP VIEW stage1.vw_STG_kaggle_superhero_base
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_STG_kaggle_superhero_base
AS
SELECT sks.[name],
       sks.[real_name],
       sks.full_name,
       sks.overall_score,
       sks.history_text,
       sks.powers_text,
       sks.intelligence_score,
       sks.strength_score,
       sks.speed_score,
       sks.durability_score,
       sks.power_score,
       sks.combat_score,
       sks.place_of_birth,
       sks.first_appearance,
       sks.creator,
       sks.alignment,
       sks.occupation,
       sks.base,
       sks.gender,
       sks.type_race,
       sks.height,
       sks.weight,
       sks.eye_color,
       sks.hair_color,
       sks.skin_color,
       sks.img,
       sks.has_electrokinesis,
       sks.has_energy_constructs,
       sks.has_mind_control_resistance,
       sks.has_matter_manipulation,
       sks.has_telepathy_resistance,
       sks.has_mind_control,
       sks.has_enhanced_hearing,
       sks.has_dimensional_travel,
       sks.has_element_control,
       sks.has_size_changing,
       sks.has_fire_resistance,
       sks.has_fire_control,
       sks.has_dexterity,
       sks.has_reality_warping,
       sks.has_illusions,
       sks.has_energy_beams,
       sks.has_peak_human_condition,
       sks.has_shapeshifting,
       sks.has_heat_resistance,
       sks.has_jump,
       sks.[has_self-sustenance],
       sks.has_energy_absorption,
       sks.has_cold_resistance,
       sks.has_magic,
       sks.has_telekinesis,
       sks.has_toxin_and_disease_resistance,
       sks.has_telepathy,
       sks.has_regeneration,
       sks.has_immortality,
       sks.has_teleportation,
       sks.has_force_fields,
       sks.has_energy_manipulation,
       sks.has_endurance,
       sks.has_longevity,
       sks.[has_weapon-based_powers],
       sks.has_energy_blasts,
       sks.has_enhanced_senses,
       sks.has_invulnerability,
       sks.has_stealth,
       sks.has_marksmanship,
       sks.has_flight,
       sks.has_accelerated_healing,
       sks.has_weapons_master,
       sks.has_intelligence,
       sks.has_reflexes,
       sks.has_super_speed,
       sks.has_durability,
       sks.has_stamina,
       sks.has_agility,
       sks.has_super_strength
FROM stage1.STG_kaggle_superhero sks
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_STG_kaggle_superhero_superpowers') IS NOT NULL
    DROP VIEW stage1.vw_STG_kaggle_superhero_superpowers
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_STG_kaggle_superhero_superpowers
AS 

WITH clean AS (
    SELECT sks.[name],
        REPLACE(sks.superpowers,'''','"') AS superpowers
    FROM stage1.STG_kaggle_superhero sks
)

SELECT c.[name], jd.superpower
FROM clean c
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(c.superpowers)
        WITH (
            superpower VARCHAR(256) '$'
        ) AS jd

GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_STG_kaggle_superhero_alter_egos') IS NOT NULL
    DROP VIEW stage1.vw_STG_kaggle_superhero_alter_egos
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_STG_kaggle_superhero_alter_egos
AS 

WITH clean AS (
    SELECT sks.[name],
        REPLACE (
            REPLACE(
                REPLACE(
                    REPLACE(sks.alter_egos,'[''','["'), ''']', '"]')
                    , ''',','",'
                ), ', ''', ', "'
         ) AS alter_egos
    FROM stage1.STG_kaggle_superhero sks
)

SELECT c.[name], jd.[alter_ego]
FROM clean c
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(c.alter_egos)
        WITH (
            [alter_ego] VARCHAR(256) '$'
        ) AS jd

GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_STG_kaggle_superhero_aliases') IS NOT NULL
    DROP VIEW stage1.vw_STG_kaggle_superhero_aliases
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_STG_kaggle_superhero_aliases
AS 

WITH clean AS (
    SELECT sks.[name],
        REPLACE(
            REPLACE(
                REPLACE (
                    REPLACE(
                        REPLACE(
                            REPLACE(sks.aliases,'[''',''), ''']', '')
                            , ''',',','
                        ), ', ''', ', '
                ), '["',''
            ), '"]',''
        ) AS [alias]
    FROM stage1.STG_kaggle_superhero sks
)

SELECT c.[name], jd.[value] AS [alias]
FROM clean c
    CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(c.[alias],',') AS jd
WHERE jd.[value] <> ''

GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_STG_kaggle_superhero_teams') IS NOT NULL
    DROP VIEW stage1.vw_STG_kaggle_superhero_teams
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_STG_kaggle_superhero_teams
AS

WITH clean AS (
    SELECT [name], 
            REPLACE (
                REPLACE(
                    REPLACE(
                        REPLACE(sks.teams,'[''','["'), ''']', '"]')
                        , ''',','",'
                    ), ', ''', ', "'
            ) AS teams
    FROM stage1.STG_kaggle_superhero sks
)

SELECT [name], jd.team
FROM clean c
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(c.teams)
        WITH (
            team VARCHAR(256) '$'
        ) AS jd

GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base') IS NOT NULL  
    DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base
AS

SELECT [name], supername, [description], species, ranking,
    aliases, authors, images, partners, powers,
    secretIdentities, teams, urls
FROM stage1.STG_marvel_hero_raw
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(doc)
    WITH (
        aliases NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.aliases' AS JSON,
        authors NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.authors' AS JSON,
        description VARCHAR(256),
        images NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.images' AS JSON,
        name VARCHAR(256),
        partners NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.partners' AS JSON,
        powers NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.powers' AS JSON,
        ranking NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.ranking' AS JSON,
        secretIdentities NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.secretIdentities' AS JSON,
        species NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.species' AS JSON,
        superName VARCHAR(256),
        teams NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.teams' AS JSON,
        urls NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.urls' AS JSON
    ) AS marvel_hero 

GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_marvel_hero_species') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_species
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_species 
AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[value] AS species 
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb 
  CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.species) 
  WITH (  [value] VARCHAR(256) '$') AS jCol
  
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_marvel_hero_ranking') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_ranking
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_ranking AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[key] AS RankType,
  jCol.[value] AS RankValue
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.ranking) AS jCol
GO

IF OBJECT_ID(  'stage1.vw_marvel_hero_aliases'
  ) IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_aliases
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_aliases AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[value] AS aliases 
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.aliases) WITH (  [value] VARCHAR(256) '$'
  ) AS jCol
GO

IF OBJECT_ID(  'stage1.vw_marvel_hero_authors'
  ) IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_authors
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_authors AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[value] AS authors 
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.authors) WITH (  [value] VARCHAR(256) '$'
  ) AS jCol
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_marvel_hero_images') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_images
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_images AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[key] AS ImageType,
  jCol.[value] AS ImageURL
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.images)  AS jCol
WHERE jCol.[value] IS NOT NULL
GO

IF OBJECT_ID(  'stage1.vw_marvel_hero_partners'
  ) IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_partners
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_partners AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[value] AS partners 
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.partners) WITH (  [value] VARCHAR(256) '$'
  ) AS jCol
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_marvel_hero_powers') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_powers
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_powers AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[value] AS powers 
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.powers) WITH (  [value] VARCHAR(256) '$'
  ) AS jCol
GO

IF OBJECT_ID(  'stage1.vw_marvel_hero_secretIdentities'
  ) IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_secretIdentities
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_secretIdentities AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[value] AS secretIdentities 
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.secretIdentities) WITH (  [value] VARCHAR(256) '$'
  ) AS jCol
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_marvel_hero_teams') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_teams
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_teams AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[value] AS teams 
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.teams) WITH (  [value] VARCHAR(256) '$'
  ) AS jCol
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_marvel_hero_urls') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_urls
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_marvel_hero_urls AS 
SELECT 
  [name], 
  superName, 
  jCol.[key] AS URL_Source,
  jCol.[Value] AS URL
FROM 
  stage1.vw_marvel_hero_base vmhb 
  CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(vmhb.urls) AS jCol 
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW marvel_hero AS 
SELECT 
    base_hero.filename() AS FileName,
    marvel_hero.[name], marvel_hero.superName, marvel_hero.[description],
    marvel_hero.aliases, marvel_hero.authors, marvel_hero.images,
    marvel_hero.partners, marvel_hero.powers, marvel_hero.ranking, marvel_hero.secretIdentities,
    marvel_hero.species, marvel_hero.teams, marvel_hero.urls
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'https://synapsedvdemo.blob.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/Data/marvel_search/**'
    ,FORMAT = 'CSV'
    ,FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ,ROWTERMINATOR = '0X0b'
    ,FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
) WITH (doc NVARCHAR(MAX)) AS base_hero
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(doc)
        WITH (
            aliases NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.aliases' AS JSON,
            authors NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.authors' AS JSON,
            description VARCHAR(256),
            images NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.images' AS JSON,
            name VARCHAR(256),
            partners NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.partners' AS JSON,
            powers NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.powers' AS JSON,
            ranking NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.ranking' AS JSON,
            secretIdentities NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.secretIdentities' AS JSON,
            species NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.species' AS JSON,
            superName VARCHAR(256),
            teams NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.teams' AS JSON,
            urls NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.urls' AS JSON
        ) AS marvel_hero 
/*         CROSS APPLY OPENJSON( marvel_marvel_hero.aliases )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_aliases
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.authors )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_authors
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.partners )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_partners
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.powers )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_powers
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.secretIdentities )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_secretIdentities
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.species )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(100) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_species
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.teams )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_teams */

DECLARE @baseKeyCol VARCHAR(1000) = '[name], superName,'
DECLARE @tableOrViewSchema VARCHAR(255) = 'stage1'
DECLARE @tableOrViewName VARCHAR(255) = 'vw_marvel_hero_base'
DECLARE @fqViewName VARCHAR(512) = CONCAT_WS('.',@tableOrViewSchema,@tableOrViewName)
DECLARE @baseAlias VARCHAR(10) = 'vmhb'
DECLARE @newLine VARCHAR(2) = CHAR(13) + CHAR(10)
DECLARE @dropStatement VARCHAR(MAX) =
    'IF OBJECT_ID(''{{NewViewName}}'') IS NOT NULL ' + @newLine +
    '   DROP VIEW {{NewViewName}}' + @newLine +
    ' ; ' + @newLine + @newLine
DECLARE @createStatement VARCHAR(500) = 'CREATE VIEW {{NewViewName}} AS ' + @newLine
DECLARE @sql VARCHAR(MAX)

;WITH JsonFields AS (
    SELECT C.COLUMN_NAME, LEFT(C.COLUMN_NAME, 2) AS jAlias,
        CONCAT_WS('.',@tableOrViewSchema,REPLACE(@tableOrViewName,'_base','_' + C.COLUMN_NAME)) AS NewViewName
    FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS C 
    WHERE C.TABLE_SCHEMA = @tableOrViewSchema
        AND C.TABLE_NAME = @tableOrViewName
        AND C.DATA_TYPE = 'NVARCHAR'
        AND C.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1
        AND C.CHARACTER_SET_NAME = 'UNICODE'
), statements AS (
    SELECT CONCAT_WS(
        ' '
        ,REPLACE(@dropStatement,'{{NewViewName}}',jf.NewViewName)
        ,REPLACE(@createStatement,'{{NewViewName}}',jf.NewViewName)
        ,'SELECT'
        ,@baseKeyCol
        ,'jCol.[value] AS ' + jf.COLUMN_NAME + @newLine
        ,'FROM'
        ,@fqViewName
        ,@baseAlias + @newLine
        ,'CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(' + CONCAT_WS('.',@baseAlias,jf.COLUMN_NAME) + ')' + @newLine
        ,'WITH ([value] VARCHAR(256) ''$'') AS jCol' + @newLine
        ,'; ' + @newLine + @newLine
    ) AS createView
    FROM JsonFields jf
)

SELECT @sql = STRING_AGG(CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX),createView),@newLine)
FROM statements

PRINT (@sql)

SELECT T.TABLE_SCHEMA AS TableSchema, T.TABLE_NAME AS TableName, 'STG' AS Abbreviation,
    NULL AS RecordSourceId
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES T


SELECT C.TABLE_SCHEMA AS TableSchema, C.TABLE_NAME AS TableName,
    C.COLUMN_NAME AS ColumnName, C.ORDINAL_POSITION AS OrdinalPosition,
    C.DATA_TYPE AS DataType, C.IS_NULLABLE AS IsNullable,
    ISNULL(C.DATETIME_PRECISION,C.NUMERIC_PRECISION) AS DateNumPrecision,
    C.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH AS CharacterMaxLength,
    NULL AS Abbreviation
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS C 
ORDER BY C.TABLE_SCHEMA, C.TABLE_NAME, C.ORDINAL_POSITION

;WITH jsonSchema AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT jsonDoc.[key], jsonDoc.Type
    FROM stage1.marvel_hero_raw mhr
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(doc) jsonDoc
    WHERE jsonDoc.Type <> 0
), columns AS (
    SELECT *, QUOTENAME(js.[key]) + 
        CASE js.[Type]
            WHEN 1 THEN ' VARCHAR(4000)'
            WHEN 2 THEN ' FLOAT'
            WHEN 3 THEN ' VARCHAR(5)'
            ELSE ' NVARCHAR(MAX) ''$.' + js.[key] + ''' AS JSON'
        END AS colSQL
    FROM jsonSchema js 
)

SELECT STRING_AGG(colSQL,',' + CHAR(13) + CHAR(10)) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY [Type], [key]) AS colSQL
FROM columns

CREATE TABLE [GeoLocation] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [Name] varchar(60) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  [CreateDate] datetime DEFAULT (GETDATE())
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [SourceType] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [Name] varchar(60) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  [CreateDate] datetime DEFAULT (GETDATE())
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [Organization] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [Name] varchar(60) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  [CreateDate] datetime DEFAULT (GETDATE())
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [RecordSource] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [GeoLocationId] int NOT NULL,
  [OrganizationId] int NOT NULL,
  [Name] varchar(60) NOT NULL,
  [SourceTypeId] int NOT NULL,
  [CreateDate] datetime DEFAULT (GETDATE())
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [DataVaultTableType] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [Name] varchar(60) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  [AppendKey] varchar(10) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  [AppendKeyRule] nvarchar(255) NOT NULL CHECK ([AppendKeyRule] IN ('PREFIX', 'SUFFIX', 'AS_SCHEMA'))
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [SourceTable] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [TableSchema] varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  [TableName] varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  [RecordSourceId] int NOT NULL
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [SourceTableVersion] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [Major] int NOT NULL,
  [Minor] int NOT NULL,
  [Release] int NOT NULL,
  [SourceTableId] int NOT NULL
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [SourceColumn] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [SourceTableVersionId] int,
  [ColumnName] varchar(255),
  [DataType] varchar(255),
  [CharacterMaxLength] int,
  [DateNumPrecision] int,
  [IsNullable] nvarchar(255) NOT NULL CHECK ([IsNullable] IN ('NO', 'YES')),
  [OrdinalPosition] int NOT NULL,
  [IsBusinessKey] bit NOT NULL,
  [IsAttribute] bit NOT NULL,
  [IsPrimaryKey] bit NOT NULL,
  [IsForeignKey] bit NOT NULL
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [RawVaultTable] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [DataVaultTableTypeId] int NOT NULL,
  [Name] varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  [CreateDate] datetime NOT NULL
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [RawVaultTableVersion] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [Major] int NOT NULL,
  [Minor] int NOT NULL,
  [Release] int NOT NULL,
  [RawVaultTableId] int NOT NULL
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [TableMap] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [SourceTableVersionId] int NOT NULL,
  [RawVaultTableVersionId] int NOT NULL,
  [StagingTableVersionId] int NOT NULL,
  [WhereFilter] nvarchar(255),
  [LastModDateField] varchar(100),
  [PullData] bit DEFAULT (1),
  [TargetDirectory] nvarchar(255)
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [DataTypeMap] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [SourceTypeId] int NOT NULL,
  [SourceDataType] varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  [TargetDataType] varchar(255) NOT NULL
)
GO

ALTER TABLE [RecordSource] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([GeoLocationId]) REFERENCES [GeoLocation] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [RecordSource] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([OrganizationId]) REFERENCES [Organization] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [RecordSource] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([SourceTypeId]) REFERENCES [SourceType] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [SourceTable] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([RecordSourceId]) REFERENCES [RecordSource] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [SourceTableVersion] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([SourceTableId]) REFERENCES [SourceTable] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [SourceColumn] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([SourceTableVersionId]) REFERENCES [SourceTableVersion] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [RawVaultTable] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([DataVaultTableTypeId]) REFERENCES [DataVaultTableType] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [RawVaultTableVersion] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([RawVaultTableId]) REFERENCES [RawVaultTable] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [TableMap] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([SourceTableVersionId]) REFERENCES [SourceTableVersion] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [TableMap] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([RawVaultTableVersionId]) REFERENCES [RawVaultTableVersion] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [DataTypeMap] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([SourceTypeId]) REFERENCES [SourceType] ([Id])
GO

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX [RecordSource_index_0] ON [RecordSource] ("GeoLocationId", "OrganizationId", "Name")
GO

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX [SourceTable_index_1] ON [SourceTable] ("TableSchema", "TableName")
GO

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX [SourceTableVersion_index_2] ON [SourceTableVersion] ("Major", "Minor", "Release", "SourceTableId")
GO

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX [SourceColumn_index_3] ON [SourceColumn] ("SourceTableVersionId", "ColumnName")
GO

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX [RawVaultTableVersion_index_4] ON [RawVaultTableVersion] ("Major", "Minor", "Release", "RawVaultTableId")
GO

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX [TableMap_index_5] ON [TableMap] ("SourceTableVersionId", "RawVaultTableVersionId")
GO

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX [DataTypeMap_index_6] ON [DataTypeMap] ("SourceTypeId", "SourceDataType")
GO

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT TOP 100
    jsonContent
    , JSON_QUERY (jsonContent, '$.aliases') AS aliases
/* --> place the keys that you see in JSON documents in the WITH clause:
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key1') ASheader1
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key2')ASheader2
*/
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/Data/marvel_search/Abner_Jenkins.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS [result]

DECLARE @sql VARCHAR(MAX)

;WITH vws AS (
    SELECT 'SELECT * FROM stage1.' + C.TABLE_NAME AS sql
    FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS C
)

SELECT @sql = STRING_AGG(CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX),sql),'; ' + CHAR(13) + CHAR(10))
FROM vws

PRINT @sql

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_STG_superhero_raw_base') IS NOT NULL
    DROP VIEW stage1.vw_STG_superhero_raw_base
GO

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_STG_superhero_raw_base
AS

SELECT [NAME]
    ,[URL]
    ,[INTELLIGENCE]
    ,[STRENGTH]
    ,[SPEED]
    ,[DURABILITY]
    ,[POWER]
    ,[COMBAT]
    ,[FULL_NAME]
    -- ,[ALTER_EGOS]
    -- ,[ALIASES]
    ,[PLACE_OF_BIRTH]
    ,[FIRST_APPEARANCE]
    ,[CREATOR]
    ,[ALIGNMENT]
    ,[GENDER]
    ,[RACE]
    ,[HEIGHT]
    ,[WEIGHT]
    ,[EYE_COLOR]
    ,[HAIR_COLOR]
    ,[OCCUPATION]
    ,[BASE]
    -- ,[TEAM_AFFILIATION]
    ,[RELATIVES]
    ,[SKIN_COLOR]
    ,[TOTAL_POWER]
FROM [stage1].[STG_superhero_raw]

GO

    DROP VIEW stage1.vw_STG_superhero_raw_team_affiliation

AS

FROM stage1.[STG_superhero_raw] ssr 
    CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(ssr.TEAM_AFFILIATION,',') AS ta

    CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(ssr.alter_egos,',') AS ta

IF OBJECT_ID('stage1.vw_STG_superhero_raw_aliases') IS NOT NULL
    DROP VIEW stage1.vw_STG_superhero_raw_aliases

CREATE VIEW stage1.vw_STG_superhero_raw_aliases
